title: How do I set a custom image for the home screen and use a stock wallpaper for the lock screen?
content: If I select a custom image, I can choose "lock screen" or "lock and home screen". If I select the latter and then go choose a stock wallpaper, it only provides options for "home screen" or "lock and home screen". It seems to prevent me from having a stock lock screen with a custom home screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
